title: GateioExchange
author: GateioExchange
content: Solana’s Phone completely changes communication, with random people selling cell service peer-to-peer, and decentralized push notifications outside Google/Apple’s control.  I listened to 14 hours of a Solana's Validated podcast on this, and here’s my killer 7 minute summary:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yxWuDWlIn_8I would love to hear your thoughts

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: Although Solana is a very good project, there are several issues that still need to be addressed, and fortunately enough, developers and investors worldwide still support the project after some breakdowns. I hope they fix all the issues that may lead to more problems on this blockchain in the future. It's a good project, hands down.
